DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate effect 6 month treatment Romosozumab compare placebo determine percent change bone mineral density
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Study Evaluate AMG 785 South Korean Women With Osteoporosis .
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 3 , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study woman osteoporosis . The study design evaluate treatment Romosozumab ( AMG 785 ) month 6 month compare placebo effective increase bone mineral density .
DOC.criteria: Ambulatory postmenopausal Korean woman , ≥ 55 ≤ 90 year age enrollment . Postmenopause define spontaneous vaginal bleeding spot 12 consecutive month prior screen . BMD Tscore < /= 2.50 lumbar spine , total hip femoral neck . At least 2 vertebrae L1 L4 region least one hip evaluable DXA . Other inclusion criterion may apply . Subjects BMD Tscore < /= 4.0 lumbar spine , total hip , femoral neck . History hip fracture . Bone disease osteoporosis/ evidence clinically significant disorder , condition/ disease significant laboratory abnormality . Known sensitivity intolerance calcium vitamin D product . Other exclusion criterion may apply .
